commit message: Fix #1 with the workaround suggested in http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=28016#c10

Cache WOEIDs for locations and read Yahoo AppId from asset file.
See #9

Use Yahoo weather service as default. Allow to switch back to Google in preferences.
Closes #8. Closes #9.
Add Attributions in preference screen and in README.
